name: Star Trek: The Animated Series Season 1
summary: 星际迷航之动画系列（Star Trek: The Animated Series，1973年－1974年），由飞美逊公司制作，并播映了两季共22集每集半小时的动画。初代中大部分演员均为他们的动画角色配音。虽然自由度高的动画能提供大型的外星场景及奇特的外星生物——预算资金仍然是主要的限制——动画的品质也并不太好。其中某几集因著名科幻作家的贡献而特别突出。该系列并不被认为是经典，亦因此造成了影迷间的一些争议。然而，动画系列中的一些设定已成为《星际迷航》正史的一部分。比如柯克舰长的中间名“泰比里厄斯”，最早出现于动画系列，然后在电影《未来之城》当中正式成为官方设定的一部分。在后来的电视剧《进取号》中，一些动画系列中的概念也成为了正史的一部分。

eps.name: Beyond the Farthest Star
eps.desc: The Enterprise finds an ancient abandoned starship with a malevolent entity aboard, eager to take over the Starfleet ship.

eps.name: Yesteryear
eps.desc: After finding himself erased from recent history, Spock must travel back in time to save himself as a youth.

eps.name: One of Our Planets Is Missing
eps.desc: The crew of the Enterprise must stop a living planet-consuming cloud before it attacks an inhabited world.

eps.name: The Lorelei Signal
eps.desc: Female crew members must take over the Enterprise when the men are incapacitated by a race of sirens.

eps.name: More Tribbles, More Troubles
eps.desc: Cyrano Jones returns, infesting the Enterprise with tribbles that now grow to monstrous size.

eps.name: The Survivor
eps.desc: A famous humanitarian is found alive near the Romulan Neutral Zone after being missing for five years, but he may not be who he claims to be.

eps.name: The Infinite Vulcan
eps.desc: On a planet of intelligent plantlike creatures, the clone of a human scientist clones Mr. Spock for use in a galactic peace mission.

eps.name: The Magicks of Megas-Tu
eps.desc: At the creative center of the galaxy, a magical race puts the Enterprise crew on trial for past grievances.

eps.name: Once Upon a Planet
eps.desc: Upon returning to the Amusement Park planet, the Enterprise crew finds the computer, which generates the planet's sophisticated robots, running amok, with the caretaker nowhere to be found.

eps.name: Mudd's Passion
eps.desc: The Enterprise crew once again runs afoul of the incorrigible Harry Mudd, this time hawking a love potion that greatly influences Spock and the crew.

eps.name: The Terratin Incident
eps.desc: Exposed to spiroid epsilon waves, the Enterprise crew begins to shrink in size. If a way can not be found to stop their condition, they will soon be too small to control the ship.

eps.name: The Time Trap
eps.desc: The Enterprise and a Klingon ship are trapped in space-time warp where only their cooperation will allow them to escape.

eps.name: The Ambergris Element
eps.desc: While the Enterprise investigates a water-world, Captain Kirk and Commander Spock go missing. They've been abducted by the world's inhabitants and altered into water-breathers as well.

eps.name: The Slaver Weapon
eps.desc: Spock, Uhura and Sulu discover an ancient multi-use weapon and are captured by the Kzinti who are equally interested in it.

eps.name: The Eye of the Beholder
eps.desc: While investigating the disappearance of Federation members, Kirk and his landing party find themselves placed in an alien zoo.

eps.name: The Jihad
eps.desc: A team comprised of various experts (Kirk and Spock among them) must recover an artifact known as the Soul of the Skorr. The theft must be kept secret or a galactic holy war could break out.
